text: Hans Svarstad (11 July 1883 - 1 April 1971) was a Norwegian politician for the Christian Democratic Party. He was born in Innvik. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Hordaland in 1937, and was re-elected on two occasions. Svarstad was a member of Kvam municipality council from 1922 to 1931. Outside politics he worked as a school teacher. He was the local churchwarden for twenty years, and was active in the temperance movement. ==References== * Category:1883 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Hordaland politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Hans Svarstad
